ThingDef.label: simple research bench
ThingDef.description: A simple bench with writing implements and simple measurement devices. Researchers work here to discover new things.

ThingDef.label: hi-tech research bench
ThingDef.description: A high-tech bench with computers and electronic measurement equipment. Allows more rapid research, and unlocks advanced research projects.

ThingDef.label: art bench
ThingDef.description: A workbench equipped for creating art.

ThingDef.label: stonecutter's table
ThingDef.description: A work table with saws and chisels for cutting stone chunks into usable blocks.

ThingDef.label: hand tailor bench
ThingDef.description: A workbench for tailoring clothes by hand. Works at 50% of the speed of an electric tailoring bench.

ThingDef.label: nutrient paste dispenser
ThingDef.description: A machine that synthesizes edible nutrient paste from organic feedstocks placed in adjacent hoppers. It consumes less ingredients and time than any other meal production method - but nobody likes eating nutrient paste. Accepts raw food, but not rough plant matter like hay.

ThingDef.label: hopper
ThingDef.description: Holds resources for use by machines like nutrient paste dispensers.

ThingDef.label: butcher table
ThingDef.description: A heavy table for butchering dead creatures into pieces of raw meat.

ThingDef.label: drug lab
ThingDef.description: A work bench equipped with containers, heaters, and measurement devices for producing various drugs.

ThingDef.label: drug bench
ThingDef.description: Bench for processing plants and synthesizing various primitive drugs.

ThingDef.label: fermenting barrel
ThingDef.description: A barrel for fermenting raw wort into beer.

ThingDef.label: biofuel refinery
ThingDef.description: Refines biological matter like wood or plant matter into chemfuel.

ThingDef.label: Steam smithy
ThingDef.description: Forge for working with metals using steam energy, which greatly increases the speed of work.

ThingDef.label: Steam oven
ThingDef.description: An industrial steam oven to provide food for a large group of colonists.

ThingDef.label: machining table
ThingDef.description: A work station for assembling machinery like guns and ammunition, or breaking down dead mechanoids.

ThingDef.label: Electric smelter
ThingDef.description: Extracts usable metal from slag chunks and other mixed metal items. Consumes a lot of power.

ThingDef.label: electric stove
ThingDef.description: An electrically-powered stove with an attached countertop for preparing meals.

ThingDef.label: Forging press
ThingDef.description: An electric-powered station for smithing non-mechanical weapons and tools.

ThingDef.label: Deep drill
ThingDef.description: A deep-crust drilling rig for extracting minerals from deep under the surface.

ThingDef.label: hydroponics basin
ThingDef.description: An artificial nutrient bath for growing plants. The nutrients pumps must work continuously; the plants will die if power is cut.
